translation:
Sir Villa de Melo, August 12, 1841

Sir

Considering that you must have arrived there on foot and that it will not be possible to obtain a horse so soon for Your Excellency, Your Excellency

Without more, send your friend who kisses your hands. Manuel de Aleman

Answered August 19, 1841.
